/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc   -gencode arch=compute_70,code=sm_70 -gencode arch=compute_75,code=sm_75 -gencode arch=compute_80,code=sm_80 -ccbin /usr/local/bin/mpicc -m64 -Xcompiler "-Wall -Wextra -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-unused-parameter -I/usr/local/cuda/include -I/usr/local/cuda/cublasLt -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64" -Xfatbin -compress-all -Xcudafe --display_error_number -O3 -DNDEBUG  -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/gpt.dir/gpt.c.o CMakeFiles/gpt.dir/burn.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/gpt.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/lib
